long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(Beta) v1.0 2023-08 - Literally my first ever published chrome extension. Cross your fingers.

A free simple straight forward TTS extension with multiple voices, a right click menu, and a hotkey trigger. Just select your text and off you go! 

I was unhappy by all the free TTS options out there.  I made this for myself to help read emails and work documentation to me.  Hopefully someone else finds it useful too.

1.) Is it ugly - Yes, everything about it
2.) Was this made by an artist with no programming experience - Yes, I went to art school and work in the game dev industry.  This was mostly made by ChatGPT/Claude2.
3.) Has it been fully QA tested?  Does it work? - No, and maybe...it works on my machine.

Things I want to add:
1. A pause and stop button - right now if you ask it to read a big doc the only way to stop it is to have it start reading another selection.
2. Customizable hotkey

Feedback is always welcome!

I will probably post the code up on github for others to improve/giggle at.
